alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Otsego; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 2:28AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Otsego, Delaware and northwestern Sullivan Counties through 315 AM EDT... At 227 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Springfield to Colchester to near Hancock. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rockland, Oneonta, Walton, Delhi, Davenport, Worcester, Middlefield, Colchester, Maryland and Cooperstown. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 87A and 96A. Interstate 88 between 16 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
